Phase.name: Shared UI Components & Design System
Phase.Goal: Establish a robust, shared UI component library (packages/ui) with the "Professional Futurism" aesthetic.
Phase.Description: Phase 6 focuses on building the foundational design system for VibeCheck. We will implement a shared React component library using Tailwind CSS and Radix UI. The design capability features a "Glassmorphism" look with a specific Green (#19D95E) accent color against a dark background.

Exists.Item: Tailwind CSS Configuration with Design Tokens

Strategy.Item: Configure **Tailwind CSS** with the custom Green (#19D95E) and Dark Mode tokens.
Implement **Core Components** (Button, Card, Input) using Radix UI primitives where applicable.
Setup **Storybook** for isolated component development and verification.

Step.Details: - Create `packages/ui/package.json` with React, Tailwind, and Storybook deps. - Create `packages/ui/tsconfig.json`.

- Create `packages/ui/tailwind.config.ts`. - Define `colors`: `vibe-green` (#19D95E), `vibe-black` (#0a0a0a). - Define `animations`: `aura` glow effects. - Create `packages/ui/src/lib/utils.ts` for class merging (`cn`).

- **Button:** Variants for `default` (Green Glow), `outline`, `glass`. - **Card:** Glassmorphism style with backdrop blur. - **Input:** Custom focus ring with `vibe-green`. - Export all from `src/index.ts`.
- Configure `.storybook/main.ts` and `preview.ts`. - Create stories for Button, Card, and Input. - Verify visual regression manually.

Test.Step: Navigate to **Button > Default** and verify Green (#19D95E) glow.
Navigate to **Card > Default** and verify glassmorphism effect.

VerificationNotes.Note: pnpm install completed successfully - all dependencies linked
Tailwind directives and CSS custom properties configured in src/index.css

FutureEnhancements.Item: Add more atomic components (Badge, Avatar, Tooltip).
Implement dark/light mode toggle (initially dark mode only).
